string.text: Haah... medkit... there we go. Not dead yet, not dead yet...
DAMN! I'm going to need another tourniquet soon!
You're not the only one carrying meds, sucker.
Uugh. So much blood. Bandages, bandages, bandages.... whew.
Ghnaaa! Fuck, that's mine. That's my blood. No. Nononononono. Medkit, medkit-medkit! Aaah. Much better.
I don't die so easily, fool!
You made me use my last medkit... I'm going to enjoy stripping your corpse.
Come on, COME ON! I'm going to need another morphine shot!
Ah, hell. My kevlar's almost shredded!
Ngghhh. I'm going to give my medic a kiss if I survive this.
I need more bandages over here!
GAH! Guess those looted meds were good for something after all...
Mmmffffp! Insurance isn't going to cover this...
Just need another shot, just need another shot, just need another shot...
Guess that wasn't my last medkit, after all. I'm still in the fight, sucker!
Unnff. Bandage time. That might've killed me if you could aim worth a damn!
Inghh! Someone pass me another medkit! This one is finished!
A-aaaah-AAAAAAH! Mmmph. Thank God for morphine...
It's going to take more than that to put me down, punk!
AAARGH! Bloody, fu- EERRGHN! Medkit, medkit, medkit. Whew...
You think you're going to bleed me out? Think again.
Armour is still holding, armour is still holding, armour is still holding...
Haah... okay, just... patch it up. Not dying today.
Ugh. Can't lose focus now... medkit, don't fail me now.
Blood's slowing, but that shot nearly took me out. Keep it together.
All right, this is gonna sting. Can't believe I'm still standing.
Last medkit... if this doesn’t hold, I’m out. Come on, come on...
Shit, I’m burning up. Better get this bandage on quick.
Lucky I grabbed that extra medkit. Can't lose focus now, not when I'm this close.
I’ve survived worse... but it’s starting to feel like it’s my turn now. Patch me up!
Bandages are soaked, but no choice. Can’t give up now.
Bleeding’s slowing... I can still make it out of here. Maybe.
Come on, that’s the last of my morphine. I can’t be feeling this much, not now.
Gotta get this under control or I'm not walking out of here... Gotta stay focused.
Stitch me up, I’ll handle the rest. Just need to keep moving.
God, the pain's a mess. But it's better than no medkit, I guess.
The wound’s deep... but so am I. You won’t kill me that easy.
Yeah, this one’s gonna take a minute to heal, but I’ll make it. Keep fighting.
The blood’s slowing down, but don’t think this means I’m giving up.
This is gonna take more than bandages, but I’ll be damned if I’m gonna stop now.
Alright, that’ll hold. Can’t say I feel good, but I’m still in this fight.
My gut’s screaming, but I’m still breathing. Better keep it that way.
Yeah, that’s a hell of a shot. But I’m still here. Medkit or not, you won’t take me down.
Hah! I thought that was it for me. Guess that’s why I carry a spare.
Ow, that fucking hurt.
Damn it! Is this the Zone or a shooting gallery?
Argh, you're gonna pay for that! Just you wait...
Not bad, but you’ll need more than that to finish me!
Son of a... that actually stung. Lucky shot, punk!
Heh, I've had worse scrapes after drinking at the bar.
The Zone’s trying to kill me, and now you are too? Get in line!
You call that aim? I've seen blind dogs with better accuracy!
Alright, you got me that time... but I won’t miss next.
Bleeding again? Typical day in the Zone, huh?
Ow, you bastard! I'll show you what pain really feels like!
What is this, a free target practice session? My turn next!
I'm not dying here... not in this godforsaken place.
Agh, who even *aims* for the chest anymore? Amateur!
Patch it up quick, the bastards won’t wait for me to recover!
Heh, that’s what I get for letting my guard down. Won’t happen again!
Just another scar for the collection. Zone life, right?
Still alive? Good. Now it's my turn to return the favor.
Medkit's running low... just gotta make this one count.
What the hell was that? A warning shot? Try harder!
First blood, huh? We'll see who has the last laugh.
Yeah, I'm still standing. Gonna take more than that to drop me.
Lucky shot! Let's see if you can keep that up!
Damn it, that's another hole in my jacket! Do you know how expensive this was?
Getting real tired of bleeding out. Time to finish this!
Still breathing, still fighting. Hope you're ready for what's coming.
Alright, you’ve made your point. My turn to make mine.
Argh! Great, another set of bruises to explain later...
The Zone’s taken worse shots at me. You’re just background noise.
I’m gonna need a drink after this. Maybe three.
You're starting to annoy me. Time to end this.
Heh, you missed all the vital parts. Better luck next time.
You think I’m scared? I eat bullets for breakfast. Bring it on!
Hah, you'll need more firepower than that to put me down!
Ugh, why do I always get hit in the same spot?!
Ow! Alright, now you've made it personal!
Oh, you’re proud of that? Let’s see you try again.
Heh, you’re just giving me more reasons to keep fighting.
That the best you got? Come on, impress me!
It’s just a flesh wound... I think. Damn it hurts though!
You’d think the Zone would toughen me up by now. Guess not!
Medkit’s not magic, but it’ll have to do. Let’s keep moving.
Ugh! Feels like I just got hit by a pseudogiant!
This isn’t over! I’ll patch up and come right back for you!
Well, that sucked. Let’s even the score, shall we?
Hold on, hold on... Let me catch my breath. Then you're dead!
I’ve had worse from mutants. You're nothing special.
Heh, still standing, still breathing. Your move, punk.
Missed the vital organs. Guess I should thank you for that.
That’s gonna leave a scar... if I make it out of here alive.
I need to find some cover... then I’ll show you how it’s done.
You’ve got some nerve taking a shot at me. Let’s settle this.
Zone’s throwing everything at me today... but I’m still here.
Oh, that’s cute. You think you’ve won? Think again!
Patch me up quick... this is only the beginning.
Great, now I look like a walking bullet sponge.
You’ve scratched the surface. Let’s see if you can dig deeper.
What, you thought that was enough? Amateur.
I’m not done yet. You’ll regret leaving me breathing.
That all you got? I’ve seen rookies do better than that.
Yeah, yeah, that stung. My turn’s coming up next!
The Zone’s got a funny way of keeping me humble...
Whew! Lucky I’m wearing this armor. Still hurts like hell though!
Damn it, that almost clipped my head. Almost.
Blood’s running, but so am I. You’re not stopping me.
I’ll make it through this. Just watch me.
Hah, is that all you've got? I’ve taken worse from boars!
Alright, now I’m pissed. You better hope I don’t get back up.
That was a good shot... for a rookie. My turn now.
Son of a—! You’re gonna regret that one, pal.
Ugh, armor’s barely holding up. Time to make this quick.
Zone’s testing me today... but I’m not going down that easy.
Argh! Next time, aim somewhere that doesn’t hurt so much!
You’ll need to do better than that if you want to take me out!
That’s it? I’ve had mosquitoes in the swamps hurt worse than you.
You better pray I don’t find you after I patch this up!
Medkit or no medkit, I’m finishing this fight.
Ugh... the Zone’s not getting me today. Not today.
Heh, looks like I’m still in one piece. Barely.
I’m not dying out here. You hear me? Not here!
Come on, is that all you’ve got? Let’s end this!
Damn it, bleeding again... but I’m still breathing.
You think I’m scared? I’ve faced worse than you in the Zone.
Argh! That armor saved me, but barely. Time to move.
Patch it up, patch it up... gotta stay in the fight.
That one’s gonna sting for a while. Time to return the favor.
Ugh, I should charge rent for all these bullet holes in me.
Medkit’s not magic, but I’ll take what I can get.
Is that all you’ve got? You’re making this too easy!
Lucky shot. Won’t happen again, I promise you that.
Alright, I’ve had enough of this! Time to end it!
The Zone’s not claiming me today. I’ve got more left in me!
Great, another scar to add to the collection. Thanks for that!
You hit me, but I’m still standing. That’s all that matters.
Damn it, the armor’s failing. Better finish this fast.
I’ll be back on my feet soon. You won’t like that.
Another day, another bullet. Life in the Zone, I guess.
You’re gonna need more ammo if you want me dead!
I’ve survived anomalies worse than you. Try harder!
Morphine kicking in... finally, I can think straight.
Fentanyl... feels like fire in my veins, but at least I can move again.
Ah, God bless whoever made morphine. Still hurts like hell, though.
Popped a stim, but this isn’t over. Keep it together!
Zone-grade painkillers—barely better than chewing glass.
Inject and hope for the best... That’s my kind of medicine.
Stims are working, but my hands are still shaking... not good.
These black-market drugs are sketchy, but they’re keeping me alive.
Just shot up a dose... feels like my chest is on fire, but I’m not dying yet.
Morphine’s dulling the pain, but my head’s swimming... focus!
If I survive this, I’m swearing off these meds... until next time.
Stabbing myself with adrenaline. Let's see if it’s enough...
This syringe better not be expired... I can’t afford another infection.
Fentanyl’s hitting hard... just don’t pass out. Not yet.
These pills are doing something... but I’m still bleeding. Great.
Ugh, whatever’s in this injector burns like hell. But it works.
Med-grade stims? Or bootleg crap? Guess I’ll find out in a few minutes...
Fuck you, I'm not wasting any more moonshine on my wounds.
Painkillers, morphine, adrenaline... cocktail of survival, right?
Zone meds always come with side effects... but dying isn’t one I can afford.
Adrenaline’s got me on my feet, but my head’s pounding like a drum.
What the hell did I just inject? Feels like my veins are on fire!
Whatever was in that syringe, it’s keeping me upright. That’s all that matters.
Blood loss slowed... thank God for morphine and duct tape.
That stim felt like a lightning bolt. Still, better than bleeding out.
If this painkiller doesn’t kick in soon, I might just lose it...
Fentanyl’s doing its job... but I’m starting to feel way too numb.
Zone drugs are a gamble... but they’re the only thing keeping me alive.
These painkillers taste like crap, but I don’t care as long as they work.
That stim shot’s giving me a second wind... but for how long?
Medications working overtime... feels like I’m barely holding together.
Thank God for combat drugs. Without them, I’d already be dead.
